verbs.description: [ARG1: The Trump administration] [V: is] [ARG2: under fire] [ARGM-CAU: for its " zero tolerance " immigration policy that has led to thousands of migrant children being separated from their parents at the US - Mexico border] — and its inconsistent justifications for the practice have not helped matters .
